description:
Application for removal or variation of Condition following grant of planning permission Ref: P120484 dated 10 September 2012 for the erection of 11 storey over basement building comprising four Class A1 retail units at ground floor level and 15,396 sqm of Class B1 (office) above, plus ancillary facilities including provision of basement level servicing.

The proposed amendments include: infill of colonnade at ground floor level; expression of reception entrance width increased; infill of second floor corner balcony; reduction in recess on Farringdon Road; reconfigured retail and cycle facilities at ground floor level; connection to Citigen and relocation of plant to basement level; introduction of office space at 10th floor; roof plan PV array refined; refinement of stone facade glazing details; parapet and balustrade heights adjusted to allow 1300mm balustrade to terraces; north elevation revised respond to OSD scheme; relocation of internal lightwell; updated changing facilities introduced at basement mezzanine level; and updated interface detail with Crossrail OSD.
